description: This file is an HTML document that contains embedded JavaScript code defining a Calculator class extending a Service, and initializes a service manager to register the Calculator service. It appears to be part of a web-based JavaScript client for a remote service framework.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A JavaScript class that defines remote callable methods 'add' and 'sub' for a calculator service, extending a base 'Service' class.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Remotely callable method that sums an array of numbers and logs input params.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Remotely callable method that subtracts two numbers and logs input params.
